title: Miniseries
summary: A miniseries, also spelt mini-series, is a television series that tells a story in a predetermined, limited number of episodes. It is to be distinguished from the term "limited series", of US origin, which for some time was known by the Academy of Television Arts & Sciences as a miniseries, but the terms are sometimes used interchangeably. As of 2021 the miniseries format has risen in popularity on both streaming services and television.
